casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terry Alvin HYATT. No. 402A00-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 28, 2006. Faith S. Bushnaq, for Terry Alvin Hyatt. Valerie B. Spalding, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of June 2006 by Defendant to Defer Consideration of Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 28th day of June 2006."
